tool_description:
Full page performance and speed analysis with a real browser using Google PageSpeed and Yahoo YSlow. Using the GTmetrix API, you can integrate performance testing into your development environment or into your application.

The GTmetrix API is based on the Web Testing Framework (WTF) Testing Service API which is RESTful API. Please contact us if you have any questions or comments about the API, or if you end up using it in a cool and interesting way!

Signup instantly for free and get your API key at http://gtmetrix.com/
name: GTmetrix
title: GTmetrix

api_list.name: resources
api_list.description: Access the test resource files. Note that the resources are only kept for 3 days. They should be downloaded on job completion if you wish to save them.

required_parameters.name: test_id
required_parameters.description: The test ID returned after starting the test

required_parameters.name: resource
required_parameters.description: Test resource to download: screenshot, har, pagespeed, pagespeed-files, yslow, report-pdf, video

api_list.name: browser
api_list.description: Fetch a browser's details and supported features
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://gtmetrix-gtmetrix.p.rapidapi.com/browsers/1"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "gtmetrix-gtmetrix.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://gtmetrix-gtmetrix.p.rapidapi.com/browsers/{browser_id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "gtmetrix-gtmetrix.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: results
api_list.description: Fetch the results of a launched test, and when complete, access the test data and resources.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://gtmetrix-gtmetrix.p.rapidapi.com/test/R1IHYZhK/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "gtmetrix-gtmetrix.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
